<MethodEndpoint

>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This method is used to insert a new entry of PFM Account Transaction.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"","required":["clientRequestId","merchantName","cashDirection","taxId","settlementType"],"type":"object","properties":{"clientRequestId":{"description":"The unique Id to identify the request and uses as idempotence.","type":"string"},"merchantName":{"description":"Name of the establishment where the purchase/transaction was made.","type":"string"},"settlementType":{"description":"Taxonomic category. Used for internal categorization of a transaction.","enum":["BANKSLIP","UTILITIES","TEF","TED","DOC","PIX","TAXES","OTHERS"],"type":"string"},"taxId":{"description":"Tax Identification - CPF (11 digits formatted) or CNPJ (14 digits formatted), fill with zeros left of the number if necessary.","type":"string"},"cashDirection":{"description":"The Transaction Flow.","enum":["CashIn","CashOut"],"type":"string"},"tags":{"description":"List of tags","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"example":{"clientRequestId":"string","mcc":"3005","merchantIdCode":"string","merchantName":"string","isExpense":true},"title":"PfmAccountRequest"},"examples":{"pfmAccoutRequest":{"value":{"clientRequestId":"c4d62e6e-0914-42b2-9fa5-c2729c52b875","settlementType":"TED","cashDirection":"CashOut","merchantName":"Boyer - Wilderman","taxId":"55529363377"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
